been discussing how to simplify the company's management structure and speed up the decision-making process. "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt said. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt said Larry Page also will take the lead product development and technology strategy, while Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and have the title co-founder.
